tool_description: This API returns a info such as email, phone number, etc for shopify stores. You can use this for a lead Generation.
name: Shopify Stores Info
title: Shopify Stores Info

api_list.name: Get All Collections
api_list.description:
## Retrieve All Collections from Store

Retrieve all collections from a store based on its URL.

### Endpoint

`GET /product/collections`

### Parameters

- `url`: (required) The URL of the store.

### Response

A JSON object containing information about all collections available in the store.

api_list.name: Search Products in Store
api_list.description:
## Search Products in Store

Search for products in a store based on its URL and a search query.
### Note: Only search by title, sku not available yet.

### Endpoint

`GET /product/search`

### Parameters

- `url`: (required) The URL of the store.
- `query`: (required) The search query for products.
- `limit`: (optional) Limit the number of products per page. Default is 150.

### Response

A JSON object containing information about the products matching the search query.

api_list.name: Get All Products
api_list.description:
## Retrieve All Products from Store

Retrieve all products from a store based on its URL.

### Endpoint

`GET /product/all`

### Parameters

- `url`: (required) The URL of the store.
- `limit`: (optional) Limit the number of products per page. Default is 50.
- `page`: (optional) Page number for pagination. Default is 1.

### Response

A JSON object containing information about all products available in the store.

api_list.name: Store Best Selling Products
api_list.description:
## Store Best Selling Products

Retrieve the best selling products of a store based on its URL.

### Endpoint

`GET /product/best-selling`

### Parameters

- `url`: (required) The URL of the store.
- `page`: (optional) Page number for pagination. Default is 1.

### Response

A JSON object containing information about the best selling products of the store.

api_list.name: Store Information
api_list.description:
## Store Information

Retrieve information about a store based on its URL.

### Endpoint

`GET /store/info`

### Parameters

- `url`: (required) The URL of the store.

### Response

A JSON object containing information about the store.

- `domain_info`: Object containing information about the store domain.

api_list.name: All Store Records
api_list.description:
## Get All Store Records

Retrieve all store records with pagination support.

### Endpoint

`GET /store/all`

### Parameters

- `page`: (optional) Page number for pagination. Default is 1.
- `perPage`: (optional) Number of records per page. Default is 12.

### Response

A JSON object containing the following fields:

- `domains_info`: Array of objects containing information about store domains.
- `totalPages`: Total number of pages available.
- `page`: Current page number.

api_list.name: Get Random Store Info
api_list.description:
## Get Random Store Records

Retrieve random store records with pagination support.

### Endpoint

`GET /store/random`

### Parameters

- `page`: (optional) Page number for pagination. Default is 1.
- `perPage`: (optional) Number of records per page. Default is 12.

### Response

A JSON object containing the following fields:

- `domains_info`: Array of objects containing information about random store domains.
- `totalPages`: Total number of pages available.
- `page`: Current page number.

api_list.name: Search Store Records
api_list.description:
## Search Store Records

Search for store records with pagination support.

### Endpoint

`GET /store/search`

### Parameters

- `query`: (required) The search term.
- `page`: (optional) Page number for pagination. Default is 1.
- `perPage`: (optional) Number of records per page. Default is 20.

### Response

A JSON object containing the following fields:

- `domains_info`: Array of objects containing information about store domains matching the search query.
- `totalPages`: Total number of pages available.
- `page`: Current page number.
